name: Figma Scripting & Plugin Playground
description:
Code Playground. Experiment with the Figma API.


Everthing in this file is more or less a draft. I’m learning JavaScript and Figma plugin development, and this is a running notebook where I’ll collect snippets, document my progress/learning, and (hopefully) leave helpful tips.


Inspired by @g’s https://figma.fun/dIz9w4


Email nortonking@hey.com if you have any suggestions or bugs. Definitely email me if you have a Figma scripting project you want to share. I’ll link to it in this file
